attributes.action: stop the closure fairy forrest fort william
attributes.additional_details: This amazing display of imaginary, craft and remembrance was created to honour a young victim of a terrible illness and has had many visitors from home and abroad. It is maintained and updated by volunteers and people who want  to honour their own lost ones. If properly promoted it could bring a lot of tourism to the area. Please sign this petition and if u have not visited fairy forest please do so. I am sure you will sign once you have visited.
